question_text_en: What did the agent do firstly with an object whose type is Chicken in the kitchen?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a vh2kg:Chicken .
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                        } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "kitchen" .
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose type is Chicken
qualifiers_en.question: What did the agent do?

question_text_en: What did the agent do with an object whose state is CLEAN inside the livingroom for more than or equal to 11 seconds?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                    vh2kg:state vh2kg:CLEAN .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_duration .
                ?time_duration time:numericDuration ?duration .
                FILTER(?duration >= 11)
            
                        }  }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:situationAfterEvent ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:partOf ?situation .
                ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                ?shape vh2kg:inside ?shape2 .
                ?state2 vh2kg:bbox ?shape2 ;
                    vh2kg:isStateOf ?object2 .
                ?object2 rdfs:label "livingroom" .
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.time: more than or equal to 11 seconds
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose state is CLEAN
qualifiers_en.question: What did the agent do?

question_text_en: What did the agent do firstly in the livingroom with an object which is a subclass of Furniture?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Furniture .
            
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
            
                        } order by asc(?begin_time) }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "livingroom" .
                
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Furniture
qualifiers_en.question: What did the agent do?

question_text_en: What did the agent do with an object which is a subclass of Wine_1 at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 0.85 after 2024-06-01T06:22:00 and before 2024-06-02T13:05:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                ?object a ?objectType .
                ?objectType rdfs:subClassOf vh2kg:Wine_1 .
            
                        
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxCenter ?pos3d .
                    ?pos3d rdf:rest/rdf:first ?pos_y .
                    FILTER("0.85"^^xsd:double < ?pos_y)
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-01T06:22:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-02T13:05:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.space: at a position where the Y coordinate is greater than 0.85
qualifiers_en.object: an object which is a subclass of Wine_1
qualifiers_en.question: What did the agent do?

question_text_en: What did the agent do with an object whose height is greater than or equal to 0.26m in the bedroom after 2024-06-15T03:38:00 and before 2024-06-30T08:29:00?
query:
PREFIX ho: <http://www.owl-ontologies.com/VirtualHome.owl#>
            PREFIX mssn: <http://mssn.sigappfr.org/mssn/>
            PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
            PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
            PREFIX vh2kg: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/>
            PREFIX ex: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/instance/>
            PREFIX x3do: <https://www.web3d.org/specifications/X3dOntology4.0#>
            PREFIX ac: <http://kgrc4si.home.kg/virtualhome2kg/ontology/action/>
            PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>
            PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#>
        
                    SELECT DISTINCT ?answer WHERE {
                        { select * where {
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:mainObject ?object .
                    ?state vh2kg:isStateOf ?object ;
                        vh2kg:bbox ?shape .
                    ?shape x3do:bboxSize ?size .
                    ?size rdf:rest/rdf:first ?size_y .
                    filter(?size_y >= 0.26)
                
                        
                ?event vh2kg:place ?place .
                ?place rdfs:label "bedroom" .
                
                        } }
                        
                ?event vh2kg:time ?time_interval .
                ?time_interval time:hasBeginning ?begin .
                ?begin time:inXSDDateTime ?begin_time .
                ?time_interval time:hasEnd ?end .
                ?end time:inXSDDateTime ?end_time .
                FILTER("2024-06-15T03:38:00"^^xsd:dateTime < ?begin_time && ?end_time < "2024-06-30T08:29:00"^^xsd:dateTime)
            
                        
                    ?event vh2kg:action ?answer .
                
                    } limit 1

qualifiers_en.subject: agent
qualifiers_en.object: an object whose height is greater than or equal to 0.26m
qualifiers_en.question: What did the agent do?
